content.p: Associate Professor of Business Economics;Divisional Director of Business Analytics & Economics, Faculty of Social Sciences Dr. Lee's teaching interests are in the areas of Business Economics and Economics of Strategy. He currently teaches Firm Strategy & Internationalisation at undergraduate level, Business Economics… read more Dr. Lee's research interest lies in the field of efficiency and productivity analysis. He employs the use of Data Envelopment Analysis (DEA) and Stochastic Frontier Analysis (SFA) in most of his… read more telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8019
